problem.markdown:
Replace the words in bold with these adjectives.
boringcolorfulcrowdedfunnoisy
1- The festival wasn't interesting.
Answer: boring 2- The musicians and their instruments were very loud. = noisy 3- The streets were full of people. = crowded 4- The people's clothes were lots of different colors. = colorful 5- We had a good time at the festival. = fun
